member.name: T:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.Densify
member.summary: Adds vertices along line or polygon features. Also replaces curve segments (Bezier, circular arcs, and elliptical arcs) with line segments.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.Densify.#ctor(System.Object)
member.summary: Constructor that takes all required parameters for geoprocessor execution.
member.param: The polygon or line feature class to be densified. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.Densify.in_features
member.summary: The polygon or line feature class to be densified. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.Densify.densification_method
member.summary: The method selected to handle feature densification. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.Densify.distance
member.summary: The maximum linear distance between vertices. This distance will always be applied to line segments and to simplify curves. The default value is a function of the data's xy tolerance. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.Densify.max_deviation
member.summary: The maximum distance the output segment can be from the original. This parameter only affects curves. The default value is a function of the data's xy tolerance. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.Densify.max_angle
member.summary: The maximum angle that the output geometry can be from the input geometry. The valid range is from 0 to 90. The default value is 10. This parameter only affects curves. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.Densify.out_feature_class
member.summary: Output Feature Class (out, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.Densify.ToolboxDirectory
member.summary: The directory of this tool's toolbox.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.Densify.ToolboxName
member.summary: The name of this tool's toolbox.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.Densify.ToolName
member.summary: The name of this tool.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.Densify.Alias
member.summary: The alias for this tool's toolbox.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.Densify.ParameterInfo
member.summary: The parameters used by this tool. For internal use only.

member.name: T:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.ErasePoint
member.summary: Deletes points from the input that are either inside or outside the Remove Features, depending on the Operation Type.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.ErasePoint.#ctor(System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: Constructor that takes all required parameters for geoprocessor execution.
member.param: Input features inside or outside the Remove Features will be deleted, depending on the Operation Type parameter. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.ErasePoint.in_features
member.summary: The input point features. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.ErasePoint.remove_features
member.summary: Input features inside or outside the Remove Features will be deleted, depending on the Operation Type parameter. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.ErasePoint.operation_type
member.summary: Determines if points inside or outside the remove features will be deleted. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.ErasePoint.out_feature_class
member.summary: Output Feature Class (out, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.ErasePoint.ToolboxDirectory
member.summary: The directory of this tool's toolbox.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.ErasePoint.ToolboxName
member.summary: The name of this tool's toolbox.

member.summary: The name of this tool.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.ErasePoint.ParameterInfo
member.summary: The parameters used by this tool. For internal use only.

member.name: T:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.ExtendLine
member.summary: This tool extends line segments to the first intersecting feature within a specified distance. If no intersecting feature is within the specified distance, the line segment will not be extended. Tool use is intended for quality control tasks such as cleaning up topology errors in features that were digitized without having set proper snapping environments.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.ExtendLine.#ctor(System.Object)
member.summary: Constructor that takes all required parameters for geoprocessor execution.
member.param: The line input features to be extended. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.ExtendLine.in_features
member.summary: The line input features to be extended. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.ExtendLine.length
member.summary: The maximum distance a line segment can be extended to an intersecting feature. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.ExtendLine.extend_to
member.summary: Controls whether line segments can be extended to other extended line segments within the specified extend length. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.ExtendLine.out_feature_class
member.summary: Output Feature Class (out, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.ExtendLine.ToolboxDirectory
member.summary: The directory of this tool's toolbox.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.ExtendLine.ToolboxName
member.summary: The name of this tool's toolbox.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.ExtendLine.ToolName
member.summary: The name of this tool.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.ExtendLine.Alias
member.summary: The alias for this tool's toolbox.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.ExtendLine.ParameterInfo
member.summary: The parameters used by this tool. For internal use only.

member.name: T:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.Snap
member.summary: Moves points or vertices to coincide exactly with the vertices, edges, or end points of other features. Snapping rules can be specified to control whether the input vertices are snapped to the nearest vertex, edge, or endpoint within a specified distance.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.Snap.#ctor(System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: Constructor that takes all required parameters for geoprocessor execution.
member.param: The input features whose vertices will be snapped to the vertices, edges, or end points of other features. The input features can be points, multipoints, lines, or polygons. (In, Required)
Enter the feature classes or feature layers containing the features you wish to snap to. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.Snap.in_features
member.summary: The input features whose vertices will be snapped to the vertices, edges, or end points of other features. The input features can be points, multipoints, lines, or polygons. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.Snap.snap_environment
member.summary: Enter the feature classes or feature layers containing the features you wish to snap to. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.Snap.out_feature_class
member.summary: Output Feature Class (out, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.Snap.ToolboxDirectory
member.summary: The directory of this tool's toolbox.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.Snap.ToolboxName
member.summary: The name of this tool's toolbox.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.Snap.ToolName
member.summary: The name of this tool.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.Snap.Alias
member.summary: The alias for this tool's toolbox.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.Snap.ParameterInfo
member.summary: The parameters used by this tool. For internal use only.

member.name: T:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.TrimLine
member.summary: Removes portions of a line that extend a specified distance past a line intersection (dangles). Any line that does not touch another line at both endpoints can be trimmed, but only the portion of the line that extends past the intersection by the specified distance will be removed.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.TrimLine.#ctor(System.Object)
member.summary: Constructor that takes all required parameters for geoprocessor execution.
member.param: The line input features to be trimmed. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.TrimLine.in_features
member.summary: The line input features to be trimmed. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.TrimLine.dangle_length
member.summary: Line segments that are shorter than the specified Dangle Length and do not touch another line at both endpoints (dangles) will be trimmed. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.TrimLine.delete_shorts
member.summary: Controls whether line segments which are less than the dangle length and are free-standing will be deleted. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.TrimLine.out_feature_class
member.summary: Output Feature Class (out, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.TrimLine.ToolboxDirectory
member.summary: The directory of this tool's toolbox.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.TrimLine.ToolboxName
member.summary: The name of this tool's toolbox.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.TrimLine.ToolName
member.summary: The name of this tool.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.TrimLine.Alias
member.summary: The alias for this tool's toolbox.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.TrimLine.ParameterInfo
member.summary: The parameters used by this tool. For internal use only.

member.name: T:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.Generalize
member.summary: Simplifies the input features using a specified maximum offset tolerance. The output features will contain a subset of the original input vertices.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.Generalize.#ctor(System.Object)
member.summary: Constructor that takes all required parameters for geoprocessor execution.
member.param: The polygon or line features to be generalized. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.Generalize.in_features
member.summary: The polygon or line features to be generalized. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.Generalize.tolerance
member.summary: The tolerance sets the maximum allowable offset, which will determine the degree of simplification. This value limits the distance the output geometry can differ from the input geometry. You can specify a preferred unit of measurement. The default is the feature unit. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.Generalize.out_feature_class
member.summary: Output Feature Class (out, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.Generalize.ToolboxDirectory
member.summary: The directory of this tool's toolbox.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.Generalize.ToolboxName
member.summary: The name of this tool's toolbox.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.Generalize.ToolName
member.summary: The name of this tool.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.Generalize.Alias
member.summary: The alias for this tool's toolbox.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.Generalize.ParameterInfo
member.summary: The parameters used by this tool. For internal use only.

member.name: T:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.EdgematchFeatures
member.summary: Modifies input line features by spatially adjusting their shapes, guided by the specified edgematch links, so they become connected with the lines in the adjacent dataset.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.EdgematchFeatures.#ctor(System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: Constructor that takes all required parameters for geoprocessor execution.

param.name: in_features
param.summary: Input line features to be adjusted. (In, Required)

param.name: in_link_features
param.summary: Input line features representing edgematch links. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.EdgematchFeatures.in_features
member.summary: Input line features to be adjusted. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.EdgematchFeatures.in_link_features
member.summary: Input line features representing edgematch links. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.EdgematchFeatures.method
member.summary: Edgematch method to be used to adjust either input features only or both input features and adjacent features to new connecting locations. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.EdgematchFeatures.adjacent_features
member.summary: Line features that are adjacent to input features. If specified, both the input and adjacent features are adjusted to meet at new connecting locations, either the midpoints of the edgematch links or locations nearest to the midpoints of the links on the border features (if specified). (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.EdgematchFeatures.border_features
member.summary: Line or polygon features representing borders between the input and adjacent features. When you specify border features, both input and adjacent features are adjusted to meet at new connecting locations nearest to the midpoints of the links on the border features. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.EdgematchFeatures.out_feature_class
member.summary: Output Features (out, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.EdgematchFeatures.ToolboxDirectory
member.summary: The directory of this tool's toolbox.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.EdgematchFeatures.ToolboxName
member.summary: The name of this tool's toolbox.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.EdgematchFeatures.ToolName
member.summary: The name of this tool.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.EdgematchFeatures.Alias
member.summary: The alias for this tool's toolbox.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.EdgematchFeatures.ParameterInfo
member.summary: The parameters used by this tool. For internal use only.

member.name: T:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.GenerateEdgematchLinks
member.summary: Finds matching but disconnected line features along the edges of the source data's area and its adjacent data's area, and generates edgematch links from the source lines to the matched adjacent lines.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.GenerateEdgematchLinks.#ctor(System.Object,System.Object,System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: Constructor that takes all required parameters for geoprocessor execution.

param.name: source_features
param.summary: Line features as edgematching source features. All edgematch links start at source features. (In, Required)

param.name: adjacent_features
param.summary: Line features adjacent to source features. All edgematch links end at matched adjacent features. (In, Required)

param.name: out_feature_class
param.summary: Output feature class containing lines representing edgematch links. (Out, Required)

param.name: search_distance
param.summary: The distance used to search for match candidates. A distance must be specified and it must be greater than zero. You can choose a preferred unit; the default is the feature unit. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.GenerateEdgematchLinks.source_features
member.summary: Line features as edgematching source features. All edgematch links start at source features. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.GenerateEdgematchLinks.adjacent_features
member.summary: Line features adjacent to source features. All edgematch links end at matched adjacent features. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.GenerateEdgematchLinks.out_feature_class
member.summary: Output feature class containing lines representing edgematch links. (Out, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.GenerateEdgematchLinks.search_distance
member.summary: The distance used to search for match candidates. A distance must be specified and it must be greater than zero. You can choose a preferred unit; the default is the feature unit. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.GenerateEdgematchLinks.match_fields
member.summary: Fields from source and target features, where target fields are from the adjacent features. If specified, each pair of fields are checked for match candidates to help determine the right match. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.GenerateEdgematchLinks.ToolboxDirectory
member.summary: The directory of this tool's toolbox.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.GenerateEdgematchLinks.ToolboxName
member.summary: The name of this tool's toolbox.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.GenerateEdgematchLinks.ToolName
member.summary: The name of this tool.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.GenerateEdgematchLinks.Alias
member.summary: The alias for this tool's toolbox.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.GenerateEdgematchLinks.ParameterInfo
member.summary: The parameters used by this tool. For internal use only.

member.name: T:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.GenerateRubbersheetLinks
member.summary: Finds where the source line features spatially match the target line features and generates lines representing links from source locations to corresponding target locations for rubbersheeting.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.GenerateRubbersheetLinks.#ctor(System.Object,System.Object,System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: Constructor that takes all required parameters for geoprocessor execution.

param.name: source_features
param.summary: Line features as source features for generating rubbersheet links. All links start at source features. (In, Required)

param.name: target_features
param.summary: Line features as target features for generating rubbersheet links. All links end at matched target features. (In, Required)

param.name: out_feature_class
param.summary: Output feature class containing lines representing regular rubbersheet links. (Out, Required)

param.name: search_distance
param.summary: The distance used to search for match candidates. A distance must be specified and it must be greater than zero. You can choose a preferred unit; the default is the feature unit. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.GenerateRubbersheetLinks.source_features
member.summary: Line features as source features for generating rubbersheet links. All links start at source features. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.GenerateRubbersheetLinks.target_features
member.summary: Line features as target features for generating rubbersheet links. All links end at matched target features. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.GenerateRubbersheetLinks.out_feature_class
member.summary: Output feature class containing lines representing regular rubbersheet links. (Out, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.GenerateRubbersheetLinks.search_distance
member.summary: The distance used to search for match candidates. A distance must be specified and it must be greater than zero. You can choose a preferred unit; the default is the feature unit. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.GenerateRubbersheetLinks.match_fields
member.summary: Lists of fields from source and target features. If specified, each pair of fields are checked for match candidates to help determine the right match. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.GenerateRubbersheetLinks.out_match_table
member.summary: The output table containing complete feature matching information. (Out, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.GenerateRubbersheetLinks.out_point_feature_class
member.summary: Output Point Feature Class (out, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.GenerateRubbersheetLinks.ToolboxDirectory
member.summary: The directory of this tool's toolbox.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.GenerateRubbersheetLinks.ToolboxName
member.summary: The name of this tool's toolbox.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.GenerateRubbersheetLinks.ToolName
member.summary: The name of this tool.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.GenerateRubbersheetLinks.Alias
member.summary: The alias for this tool's toolbox.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.GenerateRubbersheetLinks.ParameterInfo
member.summary: The parameters used by this tool. For internal use only.

member.name: T:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.RubbersheetFeatures
member.summary: Modifies input line features by spatially adjusting them through rubbersheeting, using the specified rubbersheet links, so they are better aligned with the intended target features.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.RubbersheetFeatures.#ctor(System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: Constructor that takes all required parameters for geoprocessor execution.

param.name: in_features
param.summary: Input line features to be adjusted. (In, Required)

param.name: in_link_features
param.summary: Input line features representing regular links for rubbersheeting. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.RubbersheetFeatures.in_features
member.summary: Input line features to be adjusted. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.RubbersheetFeatures.in_link_features
member.summary: Input line features representing regular links for rubbersheeting. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.RubbersheetFeatures.in_identity_links
member.summary: Input point features representing identity links for rubbersheeting. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.RubbersheetFeatures.method
member.summary: Rubbersheeting method to be used to adjust features. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.RubbersheetFeatures.out_feature_class
member.summary: Output Feature Class (out, Optional)

member.summary: The directory of this tool's toolbox.

member.summary: The name of this tool's toolbox.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.RubbersheetFeatures.ToolName
member.summary: The name of this tool.

member.summary: The alias for this tool's toolbox.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.RubbersheetFeatures.ParameterInfo
member.summary: The parameters used by this tool. For internal use only.

member.name: T:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.TransferAttributes
member.summary: Finds where the source line features spatially match the target line features and transfers specified attributes from source features to matched target features.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.TransferAttributes.#ctor(System.Object,System.Object,System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: Constructor that takes all required parameters for geoprocessor execution.

param.name: source_features
param.summary: Line features from which to transfer attributes. (In, Required)

param.name: target_features
param.summary: Line features to which to transfer attributes. The specified transfer fields are added to the target features. (In, Required)

param.name: transfer_fields
param.summary: List of source fields to be transferred to target features. At least one field must be specified. (In, Required)

param.name: search_distance
param.summary: The distance used to search for match candidates. A distance must be specified and it must be greater than zero. You can choose a preferred unit; the default is the feature unit. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.TransferAttributes.source_features
member.summary: Line features from which to transfer attributes. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.TransferAttributes.target_features
member.summary: Line features to which to transfer attributes. The specified transfer fields are added to the target features. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.TransferAttributes.transfer_fields
member.summary: List of source fields to be transferred to target features. At least one field must be specified. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.TransferAttributes.search_distance
member.summary: The distance used to search for match candidates. A distance must be specified and it must be greater than zero. You can choose a preferred unit; the default is the feature unit. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.TransferAttributes.match_fields
member.summary: Lists of fields from source and target features. If specified, each pair of fields are checked for match candidates to help determine the right match. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.TransferAttributes.out_match_table
member.summary: The output table containing complete feature matching information. (Out, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.TransferAttributes.out_feature_class
member.summary: Output Feature Class (out, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.TransferAttributes.ToolboxDirectory
member.summary: The directory of this tool's toolbox.

member.summary: The name of this tool's toolbox.

member.summary: The name of this tool.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.TransferAttributes.Alias
member.summary: The alias for this tool's toolbox.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.TransferAttributes.ParameterInfo
member.summary: The parameters used by this tool. For internal use only.

member.name: T:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.TransformFeatures
member.summary: Converts the coordinates of input features from one location to another through scaling, shifting, and rotating based on the transformation links between known corresponding control points.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.TransformFeatures.#ctor(System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: Constructor that takes all required parameters for geoprocessor execution.

param.name: in_features
param.summary: Input features, the coordinates of which are to be transformed. (In, Required)

param.name: in_link_features
param.summary: Input link features that link known control points for the transformation. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.TransformFeatures.in_features
member.summary: Input features, the coordinates of which are to be transformed. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.TransformFeatures.in_link_features
member.summary: Input link features that link known control points for the transformation. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.TransformFeatures.method
member.summary: Transformation method to use to convert input feature coordinates. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.TransformFeatures.out_link_table
member.summary: The output table containing input links and their residual errors. (Out, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.TransformFeatures.out_rmse
member.summary: Output RMSE (out, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.EditingTools.TransformFeatures.out_feature_class
member.summary: Output Feature Class (out, Optional)
